Customizing VirtualenvwrapperÂ¶

virtualenvwrapper adds several hook points you can use to change your settings, shell environment, or other configuration values when creating, deleting, or moving between environments. These hooks are exposed in two ways:

  • Per-User Customization
  • Extending Virtualenvwrapper
